mapper.select:
SELECT SCH_INFO_CODE , SCH_INFO_TITLE , SCH_INFO_WRITER , TO_CHAR(SCH_INFO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') SCH_INFO_DATE , TO_CHAR(SCH_INFO_STARTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') SCH_INFO_STARTDATE , TO_CHAR(SCH_INFO_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') SCH_INFO_ENDDATE , SCH_INFO_NUM , SCH_INFO_READ_CNT FROM SCHOOL_INFORMATION WHERE 1=1
AND UPPER(SCH_INFO_TITLE) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{schInfoSearch})||'%'
ORDER BY SCH_INFO_NUM DESC OFFSET #{offsetCnt} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{displayCnt} ROWS ONLY

SELECT SCH_INFO_CODE , SCH_INFO_TITLE , SCH_INFO_WRITER , TO_CHAR(SCH_INFO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') SCH_INFO_DATE , TO_CHAR(SCH_INFO_STARTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') SCH_INFO_STARTDATE , TO_CHAR(SCH_INFO_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') SCH_INFO_ENDDATE , SCH_INFO_NUM , SCH_INFO_READ_CNT FROM SCHOOL_INFORMATION WHERE TO_CHAR(SCH_INFO_STARTDATE, 'MM') = #{schInfoMonth} ORDER BY SCH_INFO_STARTDATE

SELECT SCH_INFO_CODE , SCH_INFO_TITLE , SCH_INFO_WRITER , TO_CHAR(SCH_INFO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') SCH_INFO_DATE , TO_CHAR(SCH_INFO_STARTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') SCH_INFO_STARTDATE , TO_CHAR(SCH_INFO_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') SCH_INFO_ENDDATE , SCH_INFO_READ_CNT , SCH_INFO_CONTENT , SCH_INFO_NUM FROM SCHOOL_INFORMATION WHERE SCH_INFO_CODE = #{schInfoCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHOOL_INFORMATION SET SCH_INFO_READ_CNT = SCH_INFO_READ_CNT + 1 WHERE SCH_INFO_CODE = #{schInfoCode}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(SCH_INFO_CODE) FROM SCHOOL_INFORMATION

SELECT STU_NO , STU_YEAR , STU_SEM , DECODE(STU_STATUS, '1', '재학중', '2','휴학중', '3', '제적') STU_STATUS , ST.MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , COLL.COLL_NO , COLL_NAME , DP.DEPT_NO , DEPT_NAME , DECODE(MEM_GENDER, 'M', '남', 'F', '여') MEM_GENDER , MEM_TELL , MEM_ADDR , MEM_ADDR_DETAIL , TO_CHAR(MEM_BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEM_BIRTHDAY , MEM_EMAIL , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE , MEM_IMAGE FROM STU ST, COLLEAGE COLL, DEPT DP, MEMBER MEM WHERE ST.COLL_NO = COLL.COLL_NO AND ST.DEPT_NO = DP.DEPT_NO AND ST.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO AND STU_NO = #{stuNo}

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , DECODE(MEM_ROLE, 'pro', '교수', 'stf', '교직원') MEM_ROLE , MEM_TELL , MEM_EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ROLE = 'stf'
AND UPPER(MEM_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{searchValue} ||'%')

SELECT EMP_NO , EMP.MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , COLL.COLL_NO , COLL_NAME , DP.DEPT_NO , DEPT_NAME , DECODE(MEM_GENDER, 'M', '남', 'F', '여') MEM_GENDER , MEM_TELL , MEM_ADDR , MEM_ADDR_DETAIL , TO_CHAR(MEM_BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEM_BIRTHDAY , MEM_EMAIL , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE , MEM_IMAGE , DECODE(MEM_ROLE, 'stf', '교직원', 'pro', '교수') FROM EMP EMP, COLLEAGE COLL, DEPT DP, MEMBER MEM WHERE EMP.COLL_NO = COLL.COLL_NO AND EMP.DEPT_NO = DP.DEPT_NO AND EMP.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO AND MEM_ROLE != 'stu' AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT STATUS_NO , MB.MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , ST.STU_NO , STU_YEAR , DE.DEPT_NO , DEPT_NAME , COLL.COLL_NO , COLL_NAME , TO_CHAR(APPLY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APPLY_DATE , DECODE(ING_STATUS, 'I', '승인대기', 'P', '승인완료', 'R', '승인취소') AS ING_STATUS , NOW_STATUS , AFTER_STATUS FROM MEMBER MB, STU ST, COLLEAGE COLL, DEPT DE, STATUS_INFO SI WHERE ST.STU_NO = SI.STU_NO AND ST.DEPT_NO = DE.DEPT_NO AND ST.COLL_NO = COLL.COLL_NO AND MB.MEM_NO = ST.MEM_NO AND NOW_STATUS = 'A' AND AFTER_STATUS ='A' AND ING_STATUS = 'P'

SELECT STATUS_NO , MB.MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , ST.STU_NO , STU_YEAR , DE.DEPT_NO , DEPT_NAME , COLL.COLL_NO , COLL_NAME , TO_CHAR(APPLY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APPLY_DATE , DECODE(ING_STATUS, 'I', '승인대기', 'P', '승인완료', 'R', '승인취소') AS ING_STATUS , NOW_STATUS , AFTER_STATUS FROM MEMBER MB, STU ST, COLLEAGE COLL, DEPT DE, STATUS_INFO SI WHERE ST.STU_NO = SI.STU_NO AND ST.DEPT_NO = DE.DEPT_NO AND ST.COLL_NO = COLL.COLL_NO AND MB.MEM_NO = ST.MEM_NO AND NOW_STATUS = 'E' AND AFTER_STATUS = 'E' AND ING_STATUS = 'R'
mapper.update: UPDATE STATUS_INFO SET ING_STATUS = 'P' , APPROVAL_DATE = SYSDATE , NOW_STATUS = 'A' WHERE STATUS_NO = #{statusNo}
UPDATE STATUS_INFO SET ING_STATUS = 'R' , APPROVAL_DATE = SYSDATE , AFTER_STATUS = 'E' WHERE STATUS_NO = #{statusNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ST.STU_NO , STU_YEAR , STU_SEM , DECODE(STU_STATUS, '1', '재학중', '2','휴학중', '3', '제적') STU_STATUS , ST.MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , COLL.COLL_NO , COLL_NAME , DP.DEPT_NO , DEPT_NAME , DECODE(MEM_GENDER, 'M', '남', 'F', '여') MEM_GENDER , MEM_TELL , MEM_ADDR , MEM_ADDR_DETAIL , TO_CHAR(MEM_BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEM_BIRTHDAY , MEM_EMAIL , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE , MEM_IMAGE , STATUS_CONTENT , STATUS_NO FROM STU ST, COLLEAGE COLL, DEPT DP, MEMBER MEM, STATUS_INFO SI WHERE ST.COLL_NO = COLL.COLL_NO AND ST.STU_NO = SI.STU_NO AND ST.DEPT_NO = DP.DEPT_NO AND ST.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO AND STATUS_NO = #{statusNo}

SELECT STATUS_NO , MB.MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , ST.MEM_NO , STU_YEAR , DE.DEPT_NO , DEPT_NAME , COLL.COLL_NO , COLL_NAME , TO_CHAR(APPLY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APPLY_DATE , DECODE(ING_STATUS, 'I', '승인대기', 'P', '승인완료', 'R', '승인취소') AS ING_STATUS , NOW_STATUS , AFTER_STATUS FROM MEMBER MB, STU ST, COLLEAGE COLL, DEPT DE, STATUS_INFO SI WHERE ST.STU_NO = SI.STU_NO AND ST.DEPT_NO = DE.DEPT_NO AND ST.COLL_NO = COLL.COLL_NO AND MB.MEM_NO = ST.MEM_NO AND NOW_STATUS = 'E' AND AFTER_STATUS = 'E' AND ING_STATUS = 'P'

SELECT STATUS_NO , MB.MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , ST.MEM_NO , STU_YEAR , DE.DEPT_NO , DEPT_NAME , COLL.COLL_NO , COLL_NAME , TO_CHAR(APPLY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APPLY_DATE , DECODE(ING_STATUS, 'I', '승인대기', 'P', '승인완료', 'R', '승인취소') AS ING_STATUS , NOW_STATUS , AFTER_STATUS FROM MEMBER MB, STU ST, COLLEAGE COLL, DEPT DE, STATUS_INFO SI WHERE ST.STU_NO = SI.STU_NO AND ST.DEPT_NO = DE.DEPT_NO AND ST.COLL_NO = COLL.COLL_NO AND MB.MEM_NO = ST.MEM_NO AND NOW_STATUS = 'A' AND AFTER_STATUS = 'A' AND ING_STATUS = 'R'
mapper.update: UPDATE STATUS_INFO SET ING_STATUS = 'P' , APPROVAL_DATE = SYSDATE , NOW_STATUS = 'E' , AFTER_STATUS = 'E' WHERE STATUS_NO = #{statusNo}
UPDATE STATUS_INFO SET ING_STATUS = 'R' , APPROVAL_DATE = SYSDATE , NOW_STATUS = 'A' , AFTER_STATUS = 'A' WHERE STATUS_NO = #{statusNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ST.STU_NO , STU_YEAR , STU_SEM , DECODE(STU_STATUS, '1', '재학중', '2','휴학중', '3', '제적') STU_STATUS , ST.MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , COLL.COLL_NO , COLL_NAME , DP.DEPT_NO , DEPT_NAME , DECODE(MEM_GENDER, 'M', '남', 'F', '여') MEM_GENDER , MEM_TELL , MEM_ADDR , MEM_ADDR_DETAIL , TO_CHAR(MEM_BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEM_BIRTHDAY , MEM_EMAIL , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE , MEM_IMAGE , STATUS_NO FROM STU ST, COLLEAGE COLL, DEPT DP, MEMBER MEM, STATUS_INFO SI WHERE ST.COLL_NO = COLL.COLL_NO AND ST.STU_NO = SI.STU_NO AND ST.DEPT_NO = DP.DEPT_NO AND ST.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO AND STATUS_NO = #{statusNo}

SELECT APPLY_NO , TO_CHAR(APPLY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') APPLY_DATE , DECODE(PROCESS_STATUS, 'I', '승인대기', 'P', '승인완료', 'R', '승인취소') AS PROCESS_STATUS , STU.STU_YEAR , STU.STU_SEM , STU.STU_NO , TO_CHAR(APPROVAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') APPROVAL_DATE , MULTI_MAJOR_COLL , MULTI_MAJOR_DEPT , STU.COLL_NO , STU.DEPT_NO , COLL.COLL_NAME , DEPT.DEPT_NAME , MEM_NAME , STU.MEM_NO FROM DEPT_MANAGE, STU, COLLEAGE COLL, DEPT, MEMBER MEM WHERE PROCESS_STATUS = 'P' AND MEM.MEM_NO = STU.MEM_NO AND STU.STU_NO = DEPT_MANAGE.STU_NO AND COLL.COLL_NO = DEPT_MANAGE.MULTI_MAJOR_COLL AND DEPT.DEPT_NO = DEPT_MANAGE.MULTI_MAJOR_DEPT

SELECT APPLY_NO , TO_CHAR(APPLY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') APPLY_DATE , DECODE(PROCESS_STATUS, 'I', '승인대기', 'P', '승인완료', 'R', '승인취소') AS PROCESS_STATUS , STU.STU_YEAR , STU.STU_SEM , STU.STU_NO , TO_CHAR(APPROVAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') APPROVAL_DATE , MULTI_MAJOR_COLL , MULTI_MAJOR_DEPT , STU.COLL_NO , STU.DEPT_NO , COLL.COLL_NAME , DEPT.DEPT_NAME , MEM_NAME , STU.MEM_NO FROM DEPT_MANAGE, STU, COLLEAGE COLL, DEPT, MEMBER MEM WHERE PROCESS_STATUS = 'R' AND MEM.MEM_NO = STU.MEM_NO AND STU.STU_NO = DEPT_MANAGE.STU_NO AND COLL.COLL_NO = DEPT_MANAGE.MULTI_MAJOR_COLL AND DEPT.DEPT_NO = DEPT_MANAGE.MULTI_MAJOR_DEPT
mapper.update: UPDATE DEPT_MANAGE SET PROCESS_STATUS = 'P' , APPROVAL_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE APPLY_NO = #{applyNo}
UPDATE DEPT_MANAGE SET PROCESS_STATUS = 'R' , APPROVAL_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE APPLY_NO = #{applyNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ST.STU_NO , ST.STU_YEAR , ST.STU_SEM , DECODE(STU_STATUS, '1', '재학중', '2','휴학중', '3', '제적') STU_STATUS , ST.MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , COLL.COLL_NO , COLL_NAME , DP.DEPT_NO , DEPT_NAME , DECODE(MEM_GENDER, 'M', '남', 'F', '여') MEM_GENDER , MEM_TELL , MEM_ADDR , MEM_ADDR_DETAIL , TO_CHAR(MEM_BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEM_BIRTHDAY , MEM_EMAIL , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE , MEM_IMAGE , APPLY_REASON , APPLY_NO , MULTI_MAJOR_COLL , MULTI_MAJOR_DEPT FROM STU ST, COLLEAGE COLL, DEPT DP, MEMBER MEM, DEPT_MANAGE DM WHERE ST.COLL_NO = COLL.COLL_NO AND ST.STU_NO = DM.STU_NO AND ST.DEPT_NO = DP.DEPT_NO AND ST.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO AND APPLY_NO = #{applyNo}
SELECT PROB_STATUS_CODE , PROB_STATUS_NAME FROM PROBATION_STATUS
SELECT SEM_NO , SEM_YEAR , SEMESTER FROM SEMESTER

SELECT ST.STU_NO , STU_YEAR , STU_SEM , DECODE(STU_STATUS, '1', '재학중', '2','휴학중', '3', '제적') STU_STATUS , ST.MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , COLL.COLL_NO , COLL_NAME , DP.DEPT_NO , DEPT_NAME , DECODE(MEM_GENDER, 'M', '남', 'F', '여') MEM_GENDER , MEM_TELL , MEM_ADDR , MEM_ADDR_DETAIL , TO_CHAR(MEM_BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEM_BIRTHDAY , MEM_EMAIL , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE , MEM_IMAGE , NVL(PROB.PROB_NO, '미등록') AS PROB_NO , NVL(TO_CHAR(PROB_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31') AS PROB_DATE , NVL(PROB.SEM_NO, '미등록') AS SEM_NO , NVL(PROB.PROB_STATUS_CODE, '미등록') AS PROB_STATUS_CODE , NVL(PS.PROB_STATUS_NAME, '미등록') AS PROB_STATUS_NAME FROM STU ST LEFT OUTER JOIN PROBATION PROB ON ST.STU_NO = PROB.STU_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN PROBATION_STATUS PS ON PROB.PROB_STATUS_CODE = PS.PROB_STATUS_CODE , COLLEAGE COLL , DEPT DP , MEMBER MEM WHERE ST.COLL_NO = COLL.COLL_NO AND ST.DEPT_NO = DP.DEPT_NO AND ST.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO AND ST.STU_NO = #{stuNo}

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE , DECODE(MEM_ROLE, 'stu', '학생', 'pro', '교수', 'stf', '교직원') AS MEM_ROLE , IS_CONFIRMED FROM MEMBER WHERE IS_CONFIRMED = 'I' AND MEM_ROLE != 'stf'

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE , DECODE(MEM_ROLE, 'stu', '학생', 'pro', '교수', 'stf', '교직원') AS MEM_ROLE , IS_CONFIRMED , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ADDR , MEM_ADDR_DETAIL , MEM_TELL , MEM_IMAGE , MEM_GENDER , MEM_BIRTHDAY FROM MEMBER WHERE IS_CONFIRMED = 'I' AND MEM_ROLE != 'stf' AND MEM_NO = #{memId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STU ( STU_NO , MEM_NO , STU_YEAR , STU_SEM , STU_STATUS , COLL_NO , DEPT_NO )VALUES( (SELECT 'STU_'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(STU_NO, 5))), 0) + 1, 3, '0') FROM STU) , #{memNo} , '1학년' , 1 , '1' , #{collNo} , #{deptNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , DECODE(MEM_ROLE, 'stu', '학생', 'pro', '교수', 'stf', '교직원') AS MEM_ROLE , REG_DATE , TO_CHAR(MEM_BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEM_BIRTHDAY , MEM_TELL , DECODE(IS_CONFIRMED, 'Y','승인완료', 'N', '승인취소', 'I', '승인대기') AS IS_CONFIRMED , MEM_IMAGE FROM MEMBER ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC OFFSET #{offsetCnt} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{displayCnt} ROWS ONLY

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , DECODE(MEM_ROLE, 'stu', '학생', 'pro', '교수', 'stf', '교직원') AS MEM_ROLE , REG_DATE , TO_CHAR(MEM_BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEM_BIRTHDAY , MEM_TELL , DECODE(IS_CONFIRMED, 'Y','승인완료', 'N', '승인취소') AS IS_CONFIRMED , MEM_IMAGE , MEM_ADDR , MEM_ADDR_DETAIL , MEM_EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE IS_CONFIRMED = 'Y' ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC OFFSET #{offsetCnt} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{displayCnt} ROWS ONLY

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , DECODE(MEM_ROLE, 'stu', '학생', 'pro', '교수', 'stf', '교직원') AS MEM_ROLE , REG_DATE , TO_CHAR(MEM_BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEM_BIRTHDAY , MEM_TELL , DECODE(IS_CONFIRMED, 'Y','승인완료', 'N', '승인취소') AS IS_CONFIRMED , MEM_IMAGE FROM MEMBER WHERE IS_CONFIRMED = 'N' ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC OFFSET #{offsetCnt} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{displayCnt} ROWS ONLY

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , DECODE(MEM_GENDER, 'M', '남', 'F', '여') MEM_GENDER , MEM_TELL , MEM_ADDR , MEM_ADDR_DETAIL , DECODE(MEM_ROLE, 'stu', '학생', 'pro', '교수', 'stf', '교직원') AS MEM_ROLE , TO_CHAR(MEM_BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEM_BIRTHDAY , MEM_EMAIL , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE , IS_CONFIRMED , MEM_IMAGE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo}
SELECT COUNT(MEM_NO) FROM MEMBER
SELECT COUNT(IS_CONFIRMED) FROM MEMBER WHERE IS_CONFIRMED = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(IS_CONFIRMED) FROM MEMBER WHERE IS_CONFIRMED = 'N'
